summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the purchase of the necessary materials for the construction of a sixteen inch cast iron watermain on Shilshole Avenue out of funds provided for in, and designating the same as one of the additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing waterworks system contemplated by Ordinance No. 52260, as amended by Ordinance No. 55300, and authorizing expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
